info.title: Agilis API
info.description: Agilis é uma plataforma de gestão de times de programação, permitindo atribuir tarefas e comunicar-se com os colaboradores em um único aplicativo web.

post.summary: Add a member to the organization

email.description: The email of the user to add

get.summary: Retrieve a list of users in the organization

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of users

get.summary: Retrieve a specific user in the organization

post.summary: Kick a user from the organization

get.summary: List users assigned to a project

200.description: List of users assigned to the project

get.summary: Get details of a user assigned to a project

200.description: List of task statuses for project

post.summary: Create a new project task status
